allow:
Bash(git commit --author="haro <haro@halrad.com>" -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
15-feature Essentia extraction, expanded mood formulas, docs refresh

Extract all 15 audio features per track \(was 6\): onset rate, ZCR, spectral RMS,
spectral flatness, dissonance, pitch salience, chords changes rate, 13-coeff
MFCCs. Valence formula expanded to 8 weighted inputs, arousal to 7. Raw features
stored in mbxmoods.json for runtime recomputation with tunable weights.

Fix CSV error output CR corruption from Essentia stderr. Harden CsvEscape
against embedded newlines. README and SBOM freshened for release.
EOF
\)")
